Primary Executive: Ron Skene, Executive Director; Phone: 250.644.4448; Email: ron@educo.ca
Service Details: - Offers wilderness adventures designed to inspire young people through wilderness experiences and draw forth each student’s unique qualities- Creates experiences that support youth to take the lead, become self-aware and develop a life-long connection to nature- Activities include rope courses, canoeing, climbing, rappelling, kayaking, and expeditions with backpacking, camping, discussions and interactive activities such as team building games
How to Apply: Visit the website for additional information and to enroll
